name: webdriverio-101
description: Simulasi wdio | allure | docker | github actions | slack

scripts.test: npm run clean-allure-results && npm run wdio && npm run allure-generate && npm run allure-open
scripts.allure-generate-dock: curl -X POST http://localhost:5050/generate || echo 'Failed to generate allure report'
scripts.allure-open-dock: open http://localhost:5050/allure-docker-service/projects/default/reports/latest/index.html || echo 'Failed to open allure report'
scripts.dock: npm run clean-allure-results && npm run wdio:dock && npm run wait-for-allure && npm run allure-generate-dock && npm run allure-open-dock
